entry.value: %%00010-- Ver las tablas en la base de datos%%00010SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';%%00010%%00010-- Tabla common_player_info%%00010ALTER TABLE common_player_info RENAME COLUMN person_id TO player_id;%%00010ALTER TABLE common_player_info RENAME COLUMN display_first_last TO player_name;%%00010ALTER TABLE common_player_info RENAME COLUMN draft_round TO round_pick;%%00010ALTER TABLE common_player_info RENAME COLUMN draft_year TO draft_season;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla draft_history%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_history RENAME COLUMN person_id TO player_id;%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_history RENAME COLUMN round_number TO draft_number;%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_history RENAME COLUMN season TO draft_season;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla draft_combine_stats%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_combine_stats RENAME COLUMN height_w_shoes TO height;%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_combine_stats RENAME COLUMN height_wo_shoes TO height_w_shoes;%%00010ALTER TABLE draft_combine_stats RENAME COLUMN season TO draft_season;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla team (equipos)%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN id TO team_id;%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN full_name TO team_name;%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN abbreviation TO team_abbreviation;%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN nickname TO team_nickname;%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN city TO team_city;%%00010ALTER TABLE team RENAME COLUMN state TO team_state;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla player (jugadores)%%00010ALTER TABLE player RENAME COLUMN id TO player_id;%%00010ALTER TABLE player RENAME COLUMN full_name TO player_name;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla inactive_players (jugadores inactivos)%%00010ALTER TABLE inactive_players RENAME COLUMN jersey_num TO jersey;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla line_score (puntuaciÃ³n)%%00010ALTER TABLE line_score RENAME COLUMN game_date_est TO game_date;%%00010%%00010-- Tabla team_details (detalles del equipo)%%00010ALTER TABLE team_details RENAME COLUMN abbreviation TO team_abbreviation;%%00010ALTER TABLE team_details RENAME COLUMN nickname TO team_nickname;%%00010ALTER TABLE team_details RENAME COLUMN city TO team_city;%%00010ALTER TABLE team_details RENAME COLUMN yearfounded TO year_founded;%%00010%%00010
